item.title: The Anatomy of a Bitcoin Scam - Bitclub Network Analyzed
item.description:
The Anatomy of a Bitcoin Scam - Bitclub Network Analyzed

Over the past few weeks I have been seeing these ads for a company called "BitClub Network" on my Facebook feed.

item.title: Bitcoin Exchange OKCoin Fined in Money Laundering Case - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Exchange OKCoin Fined in Money Laundering Case - NEWSBTC

Chinese Bitcoin exchange OKCoin was recently fined for unknowingly aiding money laundering operations on its platform. The Beijing-based company, which records the maximum daily Bitcoin volume, has been ordered by the Heilongjiang Provincial Court to cough up 627,569 Yuan (around $94,000) in damages. As per the ruling, OKCoin had flawed AML and KYC policies in ...

item.title: MSG_CMPCT_BLOCK enum value is already in use 路 Issue #8500 路 bitcoin/bitcoin
item.description:
MSG_CMPCT_BLOCK enum value is already in use 路 Issue #8500 路 bitcoin/bitcoin

Compact blocks MSG_CMPCT_BLOCK enum value is already in use. It is used as MSG_THINBLOCK for xthin blocks. The existing type MSG_THINBLOCK is already in use and widely deployed: In Bitcoin XT, Bit...

item.title: United Nations Wants Volunteers to Spread Bitcoin in Africa
item.description:
United Nations Wants Volunteers to Spread Bitcoin in Africa

The United Nations is seeking applications for volunteers to help spread Bitcoin adoption in Africa. Posted in an ad on OnlineVolunteering.org, the UN's volunteer portal, the post calls for qualified candidates to volunteer their time to help educate the youth of Sierra Leone about Bitcoin.

item.title: Bitcoin Video Casino - A traditional Bitcoin Casino - NEWSBTC
item.description:

Bitcoinvideocasino.com is a provably fair gambling site offering the best traditional casino experience in the whole Bitcoin gambling Industry. item.title: Legitimacy of Cryptoassets or App Coins, Their Real World Value
item.description:
Legitimacy of Cryptoassets or App Coins, Their Real World Value

Recently, experts including Coinbase co-founder Fred Ehrsam spoke of the importance of app coins and their potential to change the mechanisms of conventional and traditional businesses and operations. However, many members of the cryptocurrency and Bitcoin communities criticize the existence of app coins, questioning their legitimacy and real market values.

item.title: Telegram Bot Lara Offers Transparent Bitcoin Investment Options
item.description:
Telegram Bot Lara Offers Transparent Bitcoin Investment Options

It has been proven that many companies that lure people into investing funds for mouth-watering profits are fake. Almost all of them - intentionally - cut investors from their investments. Telegram-based Bitcoin investment bot Lara recently released an ideology paper explaining how they mean to place communication and transparency at the centerstage of their services.

item.title: Did California just kill innovation for Fintech Industries? - Bitwala
item.description:
Did California just kill innovation for Fintech Industries? - Bitwala

The US used to be a pioneer with regard to Bitcoins compared to other jurisdictions. Although the US has put enormous effort into the attempt to understand Bitcoins and its potential risk, there were no formal recommendations or guidance on a federal level.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Profit Target Hit! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Profit Target Hit! - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this evening. The European market is now closed, and it's time to take a second look at the bitcoin price for today. In this morning's analysis, we highlighted a range of around six dollars width, and suggested that we would focus on breakout scalp trades if priced managed to clear the range.

item.title: Is Blockchain The Missing Link for Internet of Things?
item.description:
Is Blockchain The Missing Link for Internet of Things?

Economies spend a lot of money on infrastructure. Yet a lot of this infrastructure lies idle and is underutilised. Big industrial machinery, medical equipment and even ports and airports are mostly unused and not used to their fullest potential. What if we were to find a way which would allow us to use our assets to their fullest capacity?
